name: Berry Farmer Lite
description:
This game was originally a simple web-game I made for my Introduction to JavaScript class. After some classmates and friends said they enjoyed playing the game (despite it being incredibly barebones), I decided I'd make a desktop version to help me learn Godot.

The game has a basic loop: click to look for berries or sticks, and eat berries so that you don't starve, while using the sticks to craft baskets to hold more berries.

The game will also save your progress, allowing you to close the game and return to it later.

I'm currently working on a full release of the game, one that'll actually have real gameplay and graphics and whatnot. Until then, here's the Lite version. Enjoy!
